paragraphs.body: Avatar: The Four Elements is a Dutch site dedicated to the original ${link_0} TV series, its film adaptation, ${link_1}, and ${link_2}. The site has its very own and popular forum, and allows visitors to watch episodes from the Avatar franchise in both Dutch and English.
paragraphs.text: Avatar: The Four Elements is a Dutch site dedicated to the original Avatar: The Last Airbender TV series, its film adaptation, The Last Airbender, and The Legend of Korra. The site has its very own and popular forum, and allows visitors to watch episodes from the Avatar franchise in both Dutch and English.

paragraphs.body: Welcome to Avatar: The Four Elements: the biggest Dutch fansite about "Avatar: The Legend of Aang" and "The Legend of Korra". Watch the newest and the old episodes in English and Dutch. On the forum you can chat with other fans about Avatar.
paragraphs.text: Welcome to Avatar: The Four Elements: the biggest Dutch fansite about "Avatar: The Legend of Aang" and "The Legend of Korra". Watch the newest and the old episodes in English and Dutch. On the forum you can chat with other fans about Avatar.
